data.chText: 律师（尤指代表当事人出庭者）
data.enText: a lawyer, especially one who can act for sb in court

data.chText: （业务或法律事务上的）代理人
data.enText: a person who is given the power to act on behalf of another in business or legal matters

data.chText: 她在父亲生病时代理父亲的事务。
data.enText: She was made her father's attorney when he became ill.

simple_means.memory_skill: at 加强 + torn 转 + ey → 玩转法律的人 → 律师

means: 律师(尤指代表当事人出庭者)
(业务或法律事务上的)代理人

tr: a professional person authorized to practice law
conducts lawsuits or gives legal advice

value.def: In the United States, an attorney or attorney at law is a lawyer.

trans: (商业或金融等事务的)代表权，代理权

partsOfSpeech.dec: at 加强 + torn 转 + ey → 玩转法律的人 → 律师
con 共同 + tour 转 → 共同转一圈 →〔看〕轮廓
de 加强 + tour 转 → 转着走 → 绕路
torn 转 + ado → 转着的风 → 龙卷风
tourna〔= tourn〕转 + ment 表名词 → 转着轮流比赛 → 锦标赛
